name: To Wonder In Shifting Truths
description:
To Wonder In Shifting Truths is a game developed in 32h for Porto Graphics Game Jam 2016, which the theme was "twist".

The game plays with the 3D reference space as the player has to rotate the room in order to open the next door.

Art by Tito Machado, Miguel Figueiredo and Ana Lopes. Concept art by Inês Silva. Code by Ana Lopes.

Controls:

  • WASD + mouse to move.
  • 'E' to open doors.
